actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to revise the boundaries of the Craters of the Moon National Monument, and for other purposes.
short_title: Craters of the Moon National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993

summary.text: Craters of the Moon National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993 - Revises the boundaries of Craters of the Moon National Monument, Idaho. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified land and interests in land within such revised boundaries. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Craters of the Moon National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993
A bill to revise the boundaries of the Craters of the Moon National Monument, and for other purposes.
